creator: martin.jelle@stibo.com
text:
org.apache.slide.webdav.method.AbstractWebdavMethod contains TEXT_XML_UTF_8 with
incorrect formatted UTF-8 entry.

charset="UTF-8" should be without the quotes when setting in in the response
contenttype.

Change
    public static final String TEXT_XML_UTF_8 = "text/xml; charset=\"UTF-8\"";
to
    public static final String TEXT_XML_UTF_8 = "text/xml; charset=UTF-8";

creator: luetzkendorf@apache.org
text: Always done on the CVS HEAD. Thanks
